org.xchain.namespaces.javascript

Class MergeJavascript

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.xchain.namespaces.javascript.MergeJavascript
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Command

    @Element(localName="merge-javascript")
public abstract class MergeJavascript
extends java.lang.Object
implements Command
    A basic javascript merging command. Will cache results for a merge of the compression flag is set.
    Author:
    Mike Moulton, John Trimble, Jason Rose, Josh Kennedy
